text:
AI Strategy Report 2025
Executive Summary
The enterprise AI strategy focuses on deploying retrieval-augmented generation systems to
improve internal knowledge access. The goal is to reduce information retrieval time by 40% across
departments.
Model Deployment Plan
The organization will deploy a hybrid retrieval architecture combining dense vector search with
sparse keyword search. Cross-encoder reranking will improve answer relevance.
KPIs
Key performance indicators include hallucination rate be

rformance indicators include hallucination rate below 10%, retrieval recall above 80%, and
response latency under 2.5 seconds at P95.

Cloud Migration Guide
Overview
This guide outlines the process for migrating enterprise applications to AWS. The migration will
follow a lift-and-shift strategy initially, followed by containerization.
Architecture
Applications will be deployed using Docker containers orchestrated via Kubernetes. Data storage
will leverage Amazon S3 and RDS.
Security Considerations
All services must use encryption at rest and in transit. IAM roles must follow the principle of least
privilege.

Enterprise Security Policy
Access Control
All employees must authenticate using multi-factor authentication (MFA). Role-based access
control will be enforced across internal systems.
Data Protection
Sensitive data must be encrypted using AES-256 encryption standards. Regular audits will be
conducted quarterly.
Incident Response
Security incidents must be reported within 24 hours. The incident response team will conduct a root
cause analysis.
